gov.usgs.locator

Class Pick

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Pick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Pick>

    public class Pick
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Pick>
    Keep all the data for one pick together.
    Author:
    Ray Buland

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pick

        public Pick(Station station,
            java.lang.String chaCode,
            double arrivalTime,
            boolean cmndUse,
            java.lang.String phCode)
        Create the pick with just enough information to be useful.
        Parameters:
        station - Station information
        chaCode - Channel code
        arrivalTime - Arrival time in seconds since the epoch
        cmndUse - If true, an analyst wants the pick to be used
        phCode - Current locator or associator phase code

    • Method Detail

      • addIdAids

        public void addIdAids(java.lang.String source,
                      int dbID,
                      double quality,
                      java.lang.String obsCode,
                      AuthorType authType,
                      double affinity)
        Additional information to help in phase association or location.
        Parameters:
        source - User created string identifying the server user
        dbID - Data base ID (convenience for Hydra)
        quality - Pick uncertainty in seconds (not currently used)
        obsCode - Original pick identification (associator or analyst)
        authType - Type (e.g., human or auto) of the original phase identification
        affinity - Higher numbers make it harder to re-identify the phase

      • updateTt

        public void updateTt(Hypocenter hypo)
        Recompute the travel time for this pick when the hypocenter is updated.
        Parameters:
        hypo - Hypocenter information

      • updateID

        public void updateID(java.lang.String phCode)
        Update the phase code. This abbreviated version is only used for the initial phase ID.
        Parameters:
        phCode - New phase code

      • updateID

        public boolean updateID(boolean first,
                        boolean reWeight,
                        double azimuth,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Wresidual> wResiduals)
        When the phase is re-identified, we need to update the phase code, residual, derivatives, and optionally the weight.
        Parameters:
        first - True if this is the first phase in a group
        reWeight - True if weights are to be recomputed
        azimuth - Azimuth of the station from the source in degrees
        wResiduals - The weighted residual information used in the Rank-Sum routines is updated here
        Returns:
        True if a used phase has changed identification or is no longer used

      • initFoM

        public void initFoM()
        Initialize figure-of-merit variables.

      • setFomStat

        public void setFomStat(gov.usgs.traveltime.TTimeData tTime,
                       double fomStat)
        Set the statistical figure-of-merit variables.
        Parameters:
        tTime - Travel-time information
        fomStat - Figure-of-merit metric

      • setFomAlt

        public void setFomAlt(gov.usgs.traveltime.TTimeData tTime,
                      double fomAlt)
        Set the alternate figure-of-merit variables.
        Parameters:
        tTime - Travel-time information
        fomAlt - Figure-of-merit metric
